name: TextSplitOutput
description: Types of text objects that can be split into characters, words, and lines. Currently supports Text and BitmapText instances. / export type SplitableTextObject = Text | BitmapText; /** Contains the output elements from a text split operation. Provides access to the hierarchical structure of split text elements. ```ts const splitResult = Text.split(myText); // Access individual characters splitResult.chars.forEach(char => { char.alpha = 0; gsap.to(char, { alpha: 1, duration: 0.5 }); }); // Access words (groups of characters) splitResult.words.forEach(word => { word.scale.set(0); gsap.to(word.scale, { x: 1, y: 1, duration: 0.5 }); }); // Access lines (groups of words) splitResult.lines.forEach(line => { line.x = -200; gsap.to(line, { x: 0, duration: 0.5 }); }); ```

properties.name: chars
properties.description: Array of individual character Text objects

properties.name: words
properties.description: Array of word containers, each containing character objects

properties.name: lines
properties.description: Array of line containers, each containing word containers
